Package net.dragondelve.customdriversutil.tools.modifier

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ModifierAction
    Performs a particular action on values that are passed to it one by one returning the new value.
    SmartAction
    Performs a particular action on values that are passed to it one by one returning the new value.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BringCloserCeilingAction
    Action that reduces the gap in properties by a percent value.
    BringCloserFloorAction
    Action that reduces the gap in properties by a percent value.
    DecreaseFlatAction
    Decreases all values by a flat amount.
    DecreasePercentAmount
    Decreases all values by a certain percentage of the original amount.
    FloorCeilingAction
    Any Action that requires knowing floor and ceiling of values being modified.
    GridModifier
    Performs modifications of the grid based on the settings passed and the actionPassed.
    IncreaseDistanceCeilingAction
    Action that increases the distance between minimum and maximum value.
    IncreaseDistanceFloorAction
    Action that increases the distance between minimum and maximum value.
    IncreaseFlatAction
    Increases all values by a flat amount.
    IncreasePercentAction
    Increases all values by a certain percentage of the original amount.
    ModifierSettings
    Encapsulates settings that can be passed to a GridModifier.
